<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/servers/{server}/backups/{backup}/lock"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Toggles the lock status of a given backup for a server.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>
